text: SoundHound, Santa Clara US/San Francisco US/Toronto Canada, ONSITE Data Engineers, Speech, Search and AI, Front-end Engineers and more: http://app.jobvite.com/m?3uCiQhw0 I'm a Data Engineer/Hacker at SoundHound.
